Row.Text: The Capital receives a Pilgrim at the beginning of every Celebration. Relics generate +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence.

[LIST][LI]The Capital receives a [B]Pilgrim[/B] at the beginning of every [B]Celebration[/B].[LI][B]Relics[/B] generate +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence.[LI][B]+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Notre Dame[/B].[/LIST]
+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the Outremer's associated Wonder.
